mapper.sql: identity_id, user_id, real_name, sex, nationality, id_card, id_card_issue, id_card_effective, id_card_effective_end, positive_photo, back_photo, handheld_photo, identity_status, audit_start_time, audit_end_time, bank_card_positive, bank_card_back, bank_card_num, bank_reserve_phone, belong_area, remark, create_area_code, create_position_code, create_org_sys_code, create_system_code, create_tenant_id, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_user_name, update_time, del_flag

ali.identity_id, ali.user_id, ali.real_name, ali.sex, ali.nationality, ali.id_card, ali.id_card_issue, ali.id_card_effective, ali.id_card_effective_end, ali.positive_photo, ali.back_photo, ali.handheld_photo, ali.identity_status, ali.audit_start_time, ali.audit_end_time, ali.bank_card_positive, ali.bank_card_back, ali.bank_card_num, ali.bank_reserve_phone, ali.belong_area, ali.remark, ali.create_area_code, ali.create_position_code, ali.create_org_sys_code, ali.create_system_code, ali.create_tenant_id, ali.create_user_id, ali.create_user_name, ali.create_time, ali.update_user_id, ali.update_user_name, ali.update_time, ali.del_flag

ali.identity_id, ali.user_id, ali.real_name, ali.sex, ali.nationality, ali.id_card, ali.id_card_issue, ali.id_card_effective, ali.id_card_effective_end, ali.positive_photo, ali.back_photo, ali.handheld_photo, ali.identity_status, ali.audit_start_time, ali.audit_end_time, ali.bank_card_positive, ali.bank_card_back, ali.bank_card_num, ali.bank_reserve_phone, ali.belong_area, ali.remark, ali.create_area_code, ali.create_position_code, ali.create_org_sys_code, ali.create_system_code, ali.create_tenant_id, ali.create_user_id, ali.create_user_name, ali.create_time, ali.update_user_id, ali.update_user_name, ali.update_time, ali.del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_rbac_user_identity ali
ali.del_flag = 0
AND LOCATE(#{query.realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ali.real_name) > 0
AND LOCATE(#{query.idCard, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ali.id_card) > 0
AND ali.create_time >= #{query.startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND ali.create_time <= #{query.endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM sys_rbac_user_identity WHERE identity_id IN
#{item}
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_rbac_user_identity
del_flag = 1,
WHERE identity_id IN
#{item}
